scripts.optimize-images: for f in assets/m05-short.png assets/tiles.png; do convert $f PNG8:"$f"8 && mv -f "$f"8 ${f%.*}.png; done;
scripts.zip: rm -rf game.zip dist/ && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && pushd dist/ && zip -X -r game.zip index.html *.png *.svg *.js && ls -lah game.zip && echo $(echo "$(wc -c < game.zip) - 13312" | bc) bytes remain
